name: SimpleBartender
0:
”Alexa, ask simple bartender to give me a drink”
”Alexa, open simple bartender”
”Alexa, ask simple bartender to tell me an easy drink”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simple bartender
des: This is a skill that provides you with a random drink that is easy to whip up with less than 3 ingredients. Right now there is only about 20 drinks, but soon to be a lot more of mixtures. As always they will all be simple an easy.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
